channel.title: Mac Server Host Problems [Help Please]
channel.description:
[center]Well I have a problem when I do this step: Find your servers run.bat file, open it, and copy the line that says something along the lines of "java -Xmx500m server"
Well mine looked completely different this is my whole run.bat file looked like this.[/center]
@echo off title InsidiaX "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe" -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server pause
[center]What do I copy and paste to terminal ? Here is a link to the original post for the instructions http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,423797.0.html[/center]

item.title: Mac Server Host Problems [Help Please]
item.dc:creator: @InsanityX317 InsanityX317
item.description:
@InsanityX317 wrote:

Easy What You Do Is First You Type “CD” In Terminal Then Put Drag The File Into Terminal Then Press Enter.

AFter Thats Done Chagne The C:\program files thing to only java and put the rest then press enter its simple i do all that time i host a server on a mac its great Good Luck!!

Read full topic

item.title: Mac Server Host Problems [Help Please]
item.dc:creator: @Ttwiitter Ttwiitter
item.description:
@Ttwiitter wrote:

[center]Well I have a problem when I do this step: Find your servers run.bat file, open it, and copy the line that says something along the lines of “java -Xmx500m server”

Well mine looked completely different this is my whole run.bat file looked like this.[/center]

@echo off
title InsidiaX
“C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0\bin\java.exe” -Xmx1000m -cp bin;deps/poi.jar;deps/mysql.jar;deps/mina.jar;deps/slf4j.jar;deps/slf4j-nop.jar;deps/jython.jar;log4j-1.2.15.jar; server.Server
pause

[center]What do I copy and paste to terminal ? Here is a link to the original post for the instructions http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,423797.0.html[/center]
